ErrorMessage: An error has occurred please try again.
ErrorMessageLoading: An error occurred while connecting to the server, please try again.
ErrorEnterUserName: Enter your username or email please.
ErrorEnterUserEmail: Enter user's email or username please.
InvalidCredentials: Username or password is not valid.
Question: Question
LogoutSureMessage: Are you sure you want to sign out?
RemoveTrackerSureMessage: Are you sure you want to remove the device from your list? You'd be able to add it again.
EmptyTrackersList:
Nothing to show.
If you've got a device, you can add it to the list using the below button.
ScanBarCodeTitle: Scan the bar code on the device
UserNotAllowedToAddDevice: You need a permission by the owner to add this device.
DevicePasswordDesc: Sets the device message control password. This password is checked whenever a phone number other than center number sends SMS commands to the device.
DevicePasswordValidationError: Please specify a password having at least 6 alphanumeric characters.
CenterNumberDesc: Sets the center number of device. This mobile number can then send SMS commands to the device.
CenterNumberValidationError: Please enter a valid phone number.
UploadIntervalDesc: Sets the interval (in seconds) in which the device regularly sends information to the server.
UploadIntervalValidationError: Please enter the number of seconds.
ResetFactoryDesc: This command resets the device to its initial factory settings.
ResetFactoryAlert: This will clear all existing settings on the device. Are you sure?
PowerOffDesc: This command turns the device off. You'll need to manually turn it on then.
PowerOffAlert: This will switch off the device. Be aware that you'll need to turn it on manually. Are you sure you want to continute?
RestartDesc: This command will restart the device. The process of reconnecting might take a few minutes.
RestartAlert: The process of reconnecting might take a few minutes. Are you sure you want to continute?
MakeCallDesc: This command orders the device to make a call to the specified phone number.
MakeCallValidationError: Please enter a valid phone number.
CheckVersionDesc: This command retrieves the current platform version on the device.
CurrentSettingsDesc: This command will retreive and show the current configurations and status information of the device.
WakeupDesc: This command wakes up the GPS module immediately. The receiving device will constantly send its location to the server for a few minutes.
FindDeviceDesc: If you've lost your device nearby, execute this command and the device will ring for a minute.
TrackerQRCodePageDesc: This is the QR code of ({0}). If you share it with someone, they can scan it with their ozTracker app to add the device to their list. A user needs a permission from this device's owner.
AreYouSureRemoveItem: Are you sure you want to remove this item?
ErrorSelectUserFirst: Select a user & associated permissions please.
ErrorCodeTrackerNoReply: Device didn't respond. Please try again.
InvalidPhoneNumberError: Entered phone number is not valid.
InvalidContactNameError: Contact name is not valid. It can only contain a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and space characters.
ContactsFullError: No more contacts are suppored by this device. If you want to add a new contact you need to remove an existing one first.
SOSDesc: When in distress, your kid can inform you thanks to an intuitive SOS feature. Pressing the SOS button on the kids smartwatch for 3 seconds alternatively calls the preset numbers until someone answers the phone. You can set up to 3 SOS numbers.
SetServerDesc: This command changes the server that your device connects. CAUTION: Setting this address wrongly will disconnect your device and you'll no longer be able to send commands to the device through the application.
InvalidServerName: Invalid IP or Domain name, please try again.
InvalidPortNumber: Invalid port number. Please enter a number.
AreYouSureChangeServer: If you set these wrongly you'll no longer be able to connect to your device via this app. Are you sure?
InvalidLanguageAndTZ: Please select the language & time zone.
InvalidTimePerdiodMessage: The specified time period is invalid.
NoTrackerSelectedMessage: Please select a device from the bottom list and try again.
